topics.body:
I can't tell anymore if the sickness is getting worse or better.

At least I can get out of bed now, at least I can move around and wonder where everyone went. I know that I've lost time. The house wasn't so empty when I had the fever.

Fumbling at the fridge, I wonder where everyone is. Alice should be around at least. The girl never leaves her room, always messing around on the internet but I checked and there's no sign of her. Just a few half empty cans of Monster and a half eaten donut.

When my fingers finally grasp the handle and I get the fridge open, I stagger back at the smell.

Everything is spoiled.

What happened here? Where are my room mates?

How long have I been sick?
